body.raw: Collaborated in a specialized team to create a secure and high-speed **Telegram trading bot** for Ethereum. Implemented key features such as **Auto Buy**, **Auto Snipe**, **Custom Take Profit**, **Anti-Rug Protection**, and **Transaction Speed Control** with live blockchain data integration and optimized trade execution.
body.html: Collaborated in a specialized team to create a secure and high-speed Telegram trading bot for Ethereum. Implemented key features such as Auto Buy, Auto Snipe, Custom Take Profit, Anti-Rug Protection, and Transaction Speed Control with live blockchain data integration and optimized trade execution.
